mapper.select: SELECT merchant_name AS transactionName, transaction_date AS transactionDate, transaction_time AS transactionTime, card_name AS accountName, amount FROM Card_Transactions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(transaction_date, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth} ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_time DESC

SELECT merchant_name AS transactionName, transaction_date AS transactionDate, transaction_time AS transactionTime, card_name AS accountName, amount FROM Card_Transactions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND merchant_category = #{category} AND DATE_FORMAT(transaction_date, '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth} ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_time DESC

SELECT merchant_name AS transactionName, transaction_date AS transactionDate, transaction_time AS transactionTime, card_name AS accountName, amount FROM Card_Transactions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND transaction_date = #{today} ORDER BY transaction_time DESC

SELECT merchant_name AS transactionName, transaction_date AS transactionDate, DATE_FORMAT(transaction_time, '%H:%i') AS transactionTime, card_name AS accountName, amount FROM Card_Transactions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND transaction_date = #{today} AND merchant_category = #{category.value} ORDER BY transaction_time DESC
